p: The following electronic databases were searched to identify articles reporting outbreaks of infectious diseases in LTCFs using terms with Boolean operators during November 2019 ( Table 1): PubMed, Excerpta Medica Database (EMBASE), Cochrane CENTRAL, and Cumulative index for nursing and allied health literature (CINAHL). Studies were limited to articles written in English language and published from 2007 to 2018 to update the understanding of outbreaks in LTCFs with more recently publication since a previous review and guideline for IPC in LTCFs were published [ 2, 9]. Bibliographies in studies were hand-searched.
